output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens to any user account, causing a integer overflow in totalSupply.
The transfer function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf, allowing a user to transfer tokens to a frozen account, causing a integer overflow in balanceOf.
The transferFrom function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf, allowing a user to transfer tokens to a frozen account, causing a integer overflow in balanceOf.
The buy function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf, allowing a user to buy tokens with an arbitrary amount of ether, causing a integer overflow in balanceOf.
The sell function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf, allowing a user to sell tokens for an arbitrary amount of ether, causing a integer overflow in balanceOf.
